title: Murder Inc Takeover
itunes:title: Murder Inc Takeover
description:
Today on the show we had a Murder Inc takeover with Ja Rule and Irv Gotti. We got to the bottom of Ja Rule and his involvement with Fyre Fest, new season of Irv Gotti show Tales and more. Also Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a high school referee Mike Akinson for racist comments and Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
